Btw佢個樣就死咁

My friend Paul is a gym membership salesman who's gonna make a follow-up call and send a follow-up email to a customer who's interested in joining the ten year membership. I used to work in a gym and whenever a customer paid a visit to the gym, I always followed it up with a call or an email. Some of my colleagues followed it up with a visit to the customer. My friend Celine is interested in joining his gym. She had a meeting in her office yesterday and a follow-up has been scheduled for tomorrow. She's also writing a follow-up to the acclaimed "The Invisible Man" so she's so busy that she won't have time to pay a follow-up visit to the gym for the time being. Therefore, I handed her the membership agreement for Paul and will follow up with her in the next few days. The membership cost five hundred dollars a month which is well worth it for the wide range of facilities you can use. They sell a tub of whey protein for three hundred amd fifty dollars which is well worth it as it's normally two times more expensive. The agreement grants you access to the swimming pool as well as the gym. The cost of soy protein has edged up by four dollars whereas that of caesin protein has edged lower by eight dollars. The cost of creature has edged higher to four hundred dollars while that of nitric oxide has edged down from three hundred and ten dollars to three hundred dollars. Last Tuesday, Celine complained that she was treated badly at Starbucks. As a result, a barista provided a referral to a senior staff member who, in turn, referred her case to the manager. She'll follow the case up with the manager to be sure that it'll be dealt with seriously. In addition, she's been suffering a stroke so I referred her to a cardiologist. Recently, she posted on an online forum and suggested that the government build an art gallery so as to boost tourism which was supported by many people on the forum. The asked the forum administrator for a referral to a district councilor. They'll follow up the matter being discussed with the district councilor. I'll follow the issue up too. Her suggestion of building an art museum so as to improve tourism are deemed necessary. Last Sunday, Paul and I went to an art museum where we looked at every single huge nineteenth-century oil painting in the museum in minute detail so as not to miss ant wonderful things. He'll be throwing a birthday party in Rosewood Hotel rather than at his home in order not to disturb his neighbors.

都唔會光明正大咁落掛？

仲要無禁藥嘅system 去抵制落藥運動員

仲要特登分wnbf ifbb ，有咩運動係會咁？

replies.msg:
1.其實無光明正大咁落
只係健美運動員比普通運動員容易比大眾睇得出有無落 你一睇佢body個圍度就知佢落左野
你無留意開跑步 你唔知原來佢跑到果個時間係用左類固醇
2.有好多禁藥既system 只係道高一尺魔高一丈 例如係藥檢前減劑量/停藥之類 依家都好多比賽玩抽樣檢查 無神神捉你去驗咁 同理UFC都個個落藥 但檢到出黎既都係少數
咁當然都關D商業事既 例如MR.O有一年藥檢好嚴 果時D人又唔識破解方法 果D頭10名都無用藥 結果出黎唔震撼 無咁吸引人睇 購錢少左（當然其他運動都會有咁既情況 所以唔咁嚴）
3.佢肯分D比賽係天然 其實好事黎
就係因為開始多聲音想要睇天然比賽 所以先有呢D聲音 如果其他運動都有呢D聲音 其他運動都會檢得嚴D

利伸：唔係撐運動員 亦都好憎用藥

quote.msg:
唔係撐健美運動員
只係想講不嬲最top既運動員都落藥嫁啦
UFC,NBA,足球又好
經常都有運動員比人驗到用藥
無比人驗到果d一係就劑量控制得好
一係就未抽查佢姐
利伸：非常反對用藥黎改變自己身體結構
但佢地為左得到超越人類既肉體/體能
又唔係為威為乜 想係項運動上面有所成就姐

都唔會光明正大咁落掛？

仲要無禁藥嘅system 去抵制落藥運動員

仲要特登分wnbf ifbb ，有咩運動係會咁？

1.其實無光明正大咁落
只係健美運動員比普通運動員容易比大眾睇得出有無落 你一睇佢body個圍度就知佢落左野
你無留意開跑步 你唔知原來佢跑到果個時間係用左類固醇
2.有好多禁藥既system 只係道高一尺魔高一丈 例如係藥檢前減劑量/停藥之類 依家都好多比賽玩抽樣檢查 無神神捉你去驗咁 同理UFC都個個落藥 但檢到出黎既都係少數
咁當然都關D商業事既 例如MR.O有一年藥檢好嚴 果時D人又唔識破解方法 果D頭10名都無用藥 結果出黎唔震撼 無咁吸引人睇 購錢少左（當然其他運動都會有咁既情況 所以唔咁嚴）
3.佢肯分D比賽係天然 其實好事黎
就係因為開始多聲音想要睇天然比賽 所以先有呢D聲音 如果其他運動都有呢D聲音 其他運動都會檢得嚴D

利伸：唔係撐運動員 亦都好憎用藥
但運動既世界係咁 如果佢唔用藥都可以贏 我諗無一個選手揀用藥 佢都係為左比賽而犧牲自己 就如同明星整容咁 我非常憎整容 但都要理解佢地點解咁做 唔會鄙視佢地
